message.body: We are in Boston. Chinatown. Will be back in the hotel in a little while.
Ok. Have fun. Be careful and let me know when u r back in the hotel for the night. Love you!
We're back. I'm just getting out of the shower.
Ok. Love you! Talk to you tomorrow! Nighty night sleep tight and don't let the bed bugs bite! Lol (literally)
Haha. Clothes are bagged. Love you.
Good morning. We're about to head out to meet Michael's friends for lunch.
Morning Chicken! I wasn't going to bother you till tonight so have fun today and call me tonight. Want to know what the deal is for where u r staying tonight and getting back to airport. Love you!
Ok. I'll call you later. Love you.
